title: Cambion
contents: subtitle | Medium fiend, any evil alignment
property | Saving Throws | Str +7, Con +6, Int +5, Cha +6
property | Skills | Deception +6, Intimidation +6, Perception +4, Stealth +7
property | Damage Resistances | bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, cold, fire, lightning, poison
property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14
description | Fiendish Blessing | The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.
description | Innate Spellcasting | The cambion's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The cambion can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components
description | 3/day each | alter self, command, detect magic.
description | Multiattack | The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

description | Spear | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft ., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1 d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1 d6) fire damage.
description | Fire Ray | Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.

description | Fiendish Charm | One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.
